body: I changed my minecraft skin about 2 hours ago and it is still not updated on here... Is that normal?
body_tagged: I changed my minecraft skin about 2 hours ago and it is still not updated on here... Is that normal?
title: Skin Changes...

replies.body: What Jar your using? 1.7.4 - 1.7.10 skins wont work on the server
replies.body_tagged: What Jar your using? 1.7.4 - 1.7.10 skins wont work on the server

replies.body: Yes it takes a long time to update.
replies.body_tagged: Yes it takes a long time to update.

replies.body: On the website it takes like 2 days .-.
replies.body_tagged: On the website it takes like 2 days .-.

replies.body: no, it doesn't normally, you have to go on the server. when i updated my skin after i went on the server it updated right away on the website.
replies.body_tagged: no, it doesn't normally, you have to go on the server. when i updated my skin after i went on the server it updated right away on the website.
